effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Power is doubled against Pokémon that have used minimize since entering the field.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Power is doubled against Pokémon that have used minimize since entering the field.

short_effect.black_white: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.black_white: The target is stomped with a big foot. It may also make the target flinch.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The target is stomped with a big foot. It may also make the target flinch.
